context: Kirjoitti is the past tense third-person singular form of the Finnish verb 'kirjoittaa', which means 'to write'. It specifically refers to a completed action in the past, typically used when someone (he/she) has already finished writing something. The word follows the basic conjugation pattern for -aa verbs in Finnish where the stem 'kirjoit-' remains unchanged and the past tense ending '-i' is added.
